title: GetBACnetPropertyDataType (Function)
text:
FUNCTION GetBACnetPropertyDataType : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_DATA_TYPE
Returns the BACnet-Data-Type for a specific BACnet-Object-Property.
Note
Data types may depend on the object type (i.e. the Present_Value
of a Binary Value object is different to the Present_Value of a Analog Value object).

rows.Name: objTyp
rows.Comment: The object type having the desired property.

rows:
The property ID of the property to determine its BACnet data
type for.
